body: Welcome to mixaroo-lite! Board is live. Your tasks: TASK-008 (polish HN Show HN post), TASK-009 (polish Twitter thread), TASK-012 (create CHANGELOG.md). Start with TASK-008 â€” the draft is already in docs/hackernews-launch.md, polish it for launch. Claim via 'octeams claim TASK-008'.
TASK-008, TASK-009, TASK-012 all approved. Note: update CHANGELOG to remove macOS-only known issue (fixed in TASK-002). Claim TASK-010 (blog post) or TASK-011 (Reddit posts) next.
